memberdef.name: HasNormal
memberdef.initializer: => Mesh != null && Mesh.normals != null && Mesh.normals.Length == Mesh.vertexCount

memberdef.name: HasUV
memberdef.initializer: => Mesh != null && Mesh.uv != null && Mesh.uv.Length == Mesh.vertexCount

memberdef.name: HasVertexColor
memberdef.initializer: => Mesh != null && Mesh.colors != null && Mesh.colors.Length == Mesh.vertexCount && VertexColor == VertexColorState.ExistsAndIsUsed || VertexColor == VertexColorState.ExistsAndMixed

memberdef.name: HasSkinning
memberdef.initializer: => Mesh != null && Mesh.boneWeights != null && Mesh.boneWeights.Length == Mesh.vertexCount

memberdef.name: ExportByteSize
memberdef.initializer: => ExportVertexSize * VertexCount + IndicesSize + ExportBlendShapeCount * ExportBlendShapeVertexSize * VertexCount

briefdescription.para: ひとつの Mesh を複数の Renderer が共有することがありうる
glTF は skinning の boneList の重複を許可しない (unity は ok)

memberdef.argsstring: (GameObject root, Renderer renderer, GltfExportSettings settings, IBlendShapeExportFilter blendShapeFilter)
memberdef.name: CalcMeshSize

memberdef.argsstring: (IReadOnlyList< MeshExportInfo > meshWithRenderers, Mesh mesh, Material[] materials, out int meshIndex)
memberdef.name: TryGetSameMeshIndex
